subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the SpeedDialAction UI component's contents, behavior, and appearance.

subMembers.name: icon
subMembers.description: Specifies the icon the FAB or speed dial action button displays.

subMembers.name: index
subMembers.description: Allows you to reorder action buttons in the speed dial menu.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies the text label displayed inside the FAB or near the speed dial action button.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Allows you to hide the FAB from the view or the action from the speed dial menu.

properties.name: dxSpeedDialAction
properties.description: The SpeedDialAction is a button that performs a custom action. It can be represented by a Floating Action Button (FAB) or a button in a speed dial menu opened with the FAB.

Events.name: onClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when the FAB or speed dial action button is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: click
Events.description: Raised when the FAB or speed dial action button is clicked or tapped.

subMembers.name: ClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [click] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ContentReadyEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.
